Posts.Content: Hi am awaiting biopsy results (go back this Weds) but I was told when I had my mammograms done they were 95% certain that I had breast cancer. Was wondering was anyone else told this before biopsy results? Keep thinking is mammograms that effective  as a diagnostic tool that they could give me diagnosis without biopsy results??? Has anyone else had this? Head wrecked keep thinking about that 5%!
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply,will keep busy till Weds and will hope for both of us.x
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results

Posts.Content: Hi Zanib  Thank you for thinking of me. My biopsy came back and I have triple negative breast cancer. Plan at the moment is lumpectomy,chemo  then radiotherapy. Feeling  postive but having my low moments  too.  x
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results
